price: and We had no power over you, rather you yourselves were a transgressing people.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭۖ بَلۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا طَٰغِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
